items.title: tommy notes august2025
items.snippet: can you help me add to my todo list. 1 a config option for keyboard mapping so wrist quaternion key mapping + 4 pinch per hand. 2, help me create sdk and api for this app. so it's easy to work with and adapt for different uses.
